ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Lambent woes....
ygData.msgSnippet: ...and if you re a wood elf, think about the dwarven ringmail tunic.  AC 12 +8 vs magic, +8 cold and +8 vs heat. 10 pp on Rodcet Nife. Most people use this for
ygData.messageBody:
...and if you're a wood elf, think about the dwarven
ringmail tunic. AC 12 +8 vs magic, +8 cold and +8 vs
heat.

10 pp on Rodcet Nife.

Most people use this for the screaming mace
quest...for the price tho, it's the best armor in the
game...*IF* you can fit into it.


--- Randy Keith <Kalekona@...> wrote:
> Just a quick correction.
>
> The Runed Bone Fork is off of the Squire. Not the
> Scryer. =)
>
> Slight difference.
>
> Adam Wasserman wrote:
>
> > Not much to add, but here's a few...
> >
> > Things you can get yourself:
> > ----------------------------
> > Shoulder: Bloodstained Mantle (ac 6, +3 str, +10
> vs magic) [approx 50 p]
> > drops from the undead knight in unrest, Crested
> Spaulders (ac 11, +5 sta)
> > [approx 150 p] drops from the avenging caitiff in
> MM
> > Earings: Opalline Earing (ac 2, +5 cha) [approx 15
> p] drops from the undead
> > bartender in unrest
> > Waist: Troll Hide Belt (ac 5, +5 str, +5 sta) [got
> mine for 200 p, only one
> > I've seen for sale] drops from the froglok warden
> in upper guk
> > Ranged: Runed Bone Fork (dam 5, delay 29, +10 vs
> fire, +10 vs cold, +10 vs
> > magic) [1000 p on Tribunal] drops from the froglok
> scryer in upper guk
> >
> > Things you will probably need to buy:
> > -------------------------------------
> > BP: Charred (ac 16, +3 str, +5 sta; renders as
> black plate) [approx 500 p]
> > Bracer: Silver Plated (ac 7, +5 vs poison, +5 vs
> disease; renders as silver
> > plate) [approx 150 p], Symbol of Loyalty to Vox
> (ac 7, +7 vs cold; renders
> > as silver plate) [approx 100 p]
> > Helm: Skull Shaped Barbute (ac 13, +35 hp, +10 vs
> magic; renders as silver
> > plate) [approx 350 p]
> > Back: Cloak of the Ice Bear (ac 8, +15 hp, +20 vs
> cold) [approx 125 p],
> > Lizardskin Cloak (ac 8, +5 dex) [approx 200 p?]
> > Arms: Azure Sleeves (ac 12; renders as no armor)
> [approx 450 p]
> > Rings: Jagged Band (ac 5, +3 str) [approx 50-75 p]
> > Feet: Charred Boots (ac 6, +3 agi, +5 vs fire, +5
> vs poison) [approx 250-300
> > p]
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Kimes, Dean W.
> [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
> > Sent: Monday, April 10, 2000 12:22 PM
> > To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> > Subject: RE: [eqbards] Lambent woes....
> >
> > >So....my question is, what armor pieces out there
> are better then
> > >bronze, but might not be as good as lambent
> (something I can feasably
> > >get with my level 21 self).
> > >2 +3 str earrings
> > >2 +4 str +2wis rings
> > I'd get Jagged Bands here, AC5 each and +3 str
> >
> > >Silver ruby veil
> > >Small bronze: bracer, BP, helm, sleeves, cloak,
> mantle
> > Depending on funds available: Skull Shaped Barbute
> for helm (300pp)
> > Crested
> Spaulders or BS Mantle
> > (150pp, 30pp)
> > Save up
> for Small Steel BP
> >
> > >Small steel: greaves, boots
> > Get Shin Greaves from Lower Guk, generally
> available for free if you ask as
> > they are no drop. This will let you seel the
> steel greaves to buy steel
> > somewhere else like arms.
> >
> > >Bracer of Erollisi Mar
> > >Collar of undead protection
> > >Elf hide gloves
> > I'd say get the Shin gauntlets from Lower Guk here
> as well. Also generally
> > available for free and near zone line to Upper.
> The AC will prolly be worth
> > more than the stats.
> >
> > >Thick leather apron
> > >Dragoon Dirk in my ranged slot
> >
> > Those are my suggestions. It becomes tougher to
> find things that are as
> > good AC-wise as bronze without soaring into the
> high 100's of pp.
> >
> > Kit
> >
> >
>
